title: Xayah & Rakan
body:
Some new editions to the champions I've been making in this style.
These were requested by HeartVine _(I found some time :P)_

Enjoy.


https://i.gyazo.com/2d1a7f405031cd492ead29cdd276f13b.png


https://i.gyazo.com/b6b03e54e8fde235f0df32bbf47abc6c.png


https://i.gyazo.com/68603e0b50d1fab23c7536ebec28fab2.png

_(why they show up different sizes? I don't know.)_

replies.body:
Lol the bottom one looks cute xD
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

Why don't they have legs?

Edit: Why are their hands stumps?

Edit2: Can you filthy degenerates not downvote me for asking a legitimate question? I was confused by the art style as I haven't seen this before. Jesus.
